description: This image captures a large, glowing spherical installation suspended in the center of an ornate room with classical architectural details. The sphere, illuminated in warm yellow and orange hues, resembles a celestial body, possibly the sun, and is the focal point of the scene. The surrounding room is bathed in a soft, ambient light that enhances the mystical and serene atmosphere. Several people are seated on the floor, gazing up at the installation, adding a human element to the otherwise otherworldly setting.
poem:
In a hall so grand and wide,
A glowing orb does gently bide.
Underneath its warm, bright hue,
People sit, a tranquil crew.
In this sphere, night turns to day, all abide.
